  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransitionSystem, VendingMachine

                      throws FVMException
        Remove an atomic proposition.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        FVMException - If the proposition is used as label of a state.

      • addLabel

        void addLabel(java.lang.String s,
              java.lang.String l)
       throws FVMException
        Label a state by an atomic proposition. Throws an exception if the label is not an atomic proposition. Does nothing if the sate is already labeled by the given proposition.
        Parameters:
        s - A state
        l - An atomic proposition.
        Throws:
        FVMException - When the label is not an atomic proposition.

      • removeLabel

        void removeLabel(java.lang.String s,
                 java.lang.String l)
        Remove a label for a state. If the state is not labeled by the given atomic proposition, the method returns without changing anything.
        Parameters:
        s - A state.
        l - An atomic proposition

      • post

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> post(java.lang.String s,
                                     java.lang.String a)
                              throws FVMException
        Compute a-successors of s.
        Parameters:
        s - A state
        a - An action
        Returns:
        The set of states that can be reached form s in one a action
        Throws:
        FVMException - When the state or the actions are not in the corresponding sets.

      • post

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> post(java.lang.String s)
                              throws FVMException
        Compute all successors of s.
        Parameters:
        s - A state
        Returns:
        The set of states that can be reached form s in one step (with any action).
        Throws:
        FVMException - When the state is not in the states sets.

        a - An action
        Returns:
        The set of states that can be reached form c in one a action
        Throws:

        s - A state
        a - An action
        Returns:

        c - A set of states
        a - An action
        Returns:
        The set of states from which c can be reached in one a action
        Throws:

      • isStateTerminal

        boolean isStateTerminal(java.lang.String s)
                 throws FVMException
        Check is a state is terminal.
        Parameters:
        s - A name of a state.
        Returns:
        True if the state has no successors.
        Throws:
        FVMException - If the given string is not a name of a state.

      • isActionDeterministic

        boolean isActionDeterministic()
        Check if the transition system is action deterministic.
        Returns:
        True if any sequence of actions induces a unique run.

      • isAPDeterministic

        boolean isAPDeterministic()
        Check if the transition system is AP deterministic.
        Returns:
        True if any sequence of atomic propositions induces a unique run.

      • isExecutionFragment

        boolean isExecutionFragment(java.lang.String[] e)
                     throws FVMException
        Check if a given sequence is an execution fragment.
        Parameters:
        e - An alternating state,action sequence.
        Returns:
        True if the given sequence is an execution fragment of the transition system.
        Throws:
        FVMException - If the given sequence is not an alternating state,action,state,action,...,state sequence.
